name: task-tracker-extension
description: Chrome extension for task tracking with time management

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run package
scripts.dev: echo 'Load extension in Chrome from this directory'
scripts.version-bump: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run update-manifest
scripts.update-manifest: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); const manifest=require('./manifest.json'); manifest.version=pkg.version; require('fs').writeFileSync('./manifest.json', JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 2));"
scripts.prepare-release: npm run version-bump && git add package.json manifest.json && git commit -m 'Bump version to v'$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
